description: Hairy hunk Collin O'Neal finds himself in the jungles of Costa Rica. Beneath the canopy of the primeval forest, Collin eats a mango, all the while enjoying the rugged beauty of his harsh surroundings. He fits in perfectly with his hairy chest and ripped muscles. He is a MAN in the jungle?and his primitive instincts practically require him to whack off!
title: APEX, Scene #06
